query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `weeklyStreakChallenges` (
	`id` bigint AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`weekStartDate` timestamp NOT NULL,
	`weekEndDate` timestamp NOT NULL,
	`isActive` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `weeklyNotifications` (
	`id` bigint AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`weeklyChallenge` int NOT NULL,
	`type` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
	`title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`message` text NOT NULL,
	`rank` int,
	`badgeIcon` varchar(50),
	`isRead` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`readAt` timestamp,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY(`id`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `weeklyNotifications` (
	`id` bigint AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`weeklyChallenge` int NOT NULL,
	`type` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
	`title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`message` text NOT NULL,
	`rank` int,
	`badgeIcon` varchar(50),
	`isRead` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`readAt` timestamp,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
